Presence of specific JavaScript strings.Action: Analyze Zeek http.log and Zeek file_info.log for HTML documents. Scan extracted HTML content for specific strings like 'Blob', 'msSaveOrOpenBlob', 'download' using regular expressions or string matching. Calculate the frequency of these strings per source/destination and identify statistically rare occurrences or bursts (time series analysis).

Execution of suspicious files dropped on.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for process creations. Correlate process creations with files recently downloaded via web browsers (identified through Zeek file_info.log or browser download history). Use lineage/correlation analysis to trace the execution of suspicious files originating from web downloads. Identify unusual execution paths or parameters using frequency analysis.
